text.p: Selected results on the third day of Henley Royal Regatta on Friday:

Nottingham 'A' (Britain) beat Upper Thames (Britain) by 1 and three-quarter lengths in six minutes and twenty-three seconds Neptune (Ireland) beat Ruderriege Turnverein 1887 eV. Essen- Kupferdreh (Germany) 1-1/2, 6:28
Thames Tradesmen 'A' (Britain) beat London Rowing Club (Britian) 2/3, 6:27
Oxford Brookes University (Britain) beat Queen's University, Belfast (Britain) 1, 6:39
Harvard University (U.S.) beat University College, Dublin (Ireland) 1-1/2, 6:39
Institut National des Sciences Appliques de Lyon (France) beat Amsterdamsche Studenten Roeivereeniging Nereus (Holland) 1, 6:41
London (Britain) beat Nottingham (Britain) Not Rowed Out (NRO), 7:03
University of London Tyrian 'A' (Britain) beat Furnivall (Britain) 1-3/4, 7:05
Greg Searle (Britain) beat Adri Middag (Holland) 1, 7:42 Matthijs Van Der Schoot (Holland) beat David Gleeson (U.S.) 1, 7:56
Rudergesellschaft Hansa Hamburg (Germany) beat University of Minnesota (U.S.) 1/2, 6:29
Imperial College and Charing Cross & Westminster Medical School
Abingdon School (Britain) beat Latymer Upper School (Britain) 2- 3/4, 7:15
Robert Thatcher and Ben Hunt-Davies (Britain) beat Simon Mepham
Claas Fischer and Sebastina Franke (Germany) beat Ian Harris
Peter Bridge and Matthew Parish (Britain) beat Jeremy Hepworth
Andre Stockman and Andreas Ortz (Germany) beat Giles Cundell
Barry Klein and Ransom Weaver (U.S.) beat Derek Atkins and Philip Noble (Britain) 4-1/4, 7:34
Lene Hansen (Britain) beat Ruth Rudkin (Britain) easily, 9:13
Guin Batten ( Britain) beat Sarah Winckless (Britain) easily, 8:32
Maria Brandin (Sweden) beat Colleen Orsmond (South Africa) easily, 8:28
Oxford Brookes and Nottinghamshire County Rowing Association (Britain) beat Leander (Britain) 3/4, 6:35
University of Washington (U.S.) beat Melbourne University (Australia) 3, 6:27
Nottinghamshire County Rowing Association and Oxford Brookes (Britain) beat Stanford (U.S.) easily, 6:25
Tara Rowing Club (Ireland) beat The Army and Royal Airitain) 4-3/4, 7:08
Maidenhead and Henley (Britain) beat Upper Thames (Britain)
Augusta Sculling Center (U.S.) beat Melbourne University (Australia) easily, 6:28
